column4: can some1 tell how to take a screenshot in xubuntu? when I hit the prt scrn button on my laptop nothing happens?
does something happen or doesn't it
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=237408 . replace the "mute sound" stuff with your button.
i'll check it out. is it going to self explanatory?
i tried to make it that way...it starts a couple posts down, by LadyDoor
next thing, i can't get an iso image mounted? i am using sudo mount -o loop -t iso9660 FC3-i386-disc1.iso /mnt/iso
does it work or doesn't it?
if something doesn't work, you don't have to *ask* us whether it works or not--a question mark means it's a question.
yes, this is what it says. mount: Not a directory
right, so does the dir exist?
(ls /mnt...if it doesn't spit anything out, it doesn't exist)
ok, i've got to run. please check to see if the dir exists, and if not, create it with mkdir
